titleStmt.title: A mustur roll of the evill angels embatteld against S, Michael. Being a collection, according to the order of time, (throughout all the centuries) of the chiefe of the ancient heretikes, with their tenets, such as were condemned by generall councels. Faithfully collected out of the most authentike authors. / By R.B. Gent.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Sheers, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Pauls Churchyard at the sign of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Pauls Churchyard at the sign of the Bible
